name: World's Strongest Hamster in The Underground Empire
name_original: World's Strongest Hamster in The Underground Empire
description:
The World's Strongest Hamster is missing! After applying for a shady part time job
he finds himself chained to a computer in an underground lair with no food in sight..

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move
Push tiles and creatures around to solve problems!
Press the direction to swap places with things when they are next to a wall!

Good luck!

Check out the devlog:  https://itch.io/jam/dungeonjam/topic/518377/devlog-a-second-descend-into-madness
